mapper.select: select fba.openid, bookAudioId, ba.name name, b.name bookName, ba.bookId bookId from favourite_book_audio fba join book_audio ba on fba.bookAudioId = ba.id join book b on ba.bookId = b.id where openid = #{openid};

select fsa.openid, shortAudioId, actId, actName, content, fileName, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.avatarUrl from favourite_short_audio fsa join short_audio sa on fsa.shortAudioId = sa.id join user u on fsa.openid = u.openid where fsa.openid = #{openid} and approved = true;
